info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 2:00PM CDT until May 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR PHILLIPS AND CENTRAL COAHOMA COUNTIES... At 200 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Watkins Corner, or 8 miles south of Marvell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Elaine, Helena-West Helena, Friars Point, Lexa, Watkins Corner, Kings, Lake View, Wabash, Modoc, Preston Place, Quarles, Hoop Spur, Westover, Wycamp, Latour, Ewal, Poplar Grove, Huma and Oneida. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
